title: #166: Surviving Dirty John: Debra Newell
description:
Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti interview Debra Newell about surviving serial perpetrator Dirty John Meehan. Debra bravely shares her story, we discuss some golden rules when on-line dating and Debra reveals that whilst John was profiling her, she was investigating him. Listen to the episode and find out what she discovered.


#HerNameISDebraNewell

#CoerciveControl

#DirtyJohn


Check out the Wondery and LA Times podcast 'Dirty John, the Bravo show 'Dirty John' and the Oxygen documentary 'Dirty John, the Dirty Truth.'


For more information about coercive control

https://www.laurarichards.co.uk/deep-diving-coercive-control/
